name: MLMediaSourceType
desc: Specifies the source type associated with a particular media source. Source type reflects the primary type of media within the source. These constants are used to specify values for MLMediaLoadSourceTypesKey in the init(options:) method of MLMediaLibrary.

items.name: static var audio: MLMediaSourceType
items.desc: Audio source type. Includes iTunes, GarageBand, and Logic.

items.name: static var image: MLMediaSourceType
items.desc: Image source type. Includes iPhoto, Aperture, and Photo Booth.

items.name: static var movie: MLMediaSourceType
items.desc: Movie source type. Includes iMovie and Final Cut Pro.
